title: IEndCapFeatureData.ChamferDistance
description: Gets or sets the chamfer distance or fillet radius of the corner of this end-cap feature.
returns: Chamfer distance if IEndCapFeatureData::UseChamferCorners is true; fillet radius if IEndCapFeatureData::UseChamferCorners is false
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IEndCapFeatureData::UseCornerTreatment
is true.
